document.discussion_title: Kathryn Nance Hopes to Unseat McNerney in House of Reps | FOX40
document.topic_text: Email Kathryn Nance hopes to unseat incumbent Rep. Jerry McNerney in California's 9th Congressional District. Nance is currently the president of the Stockton Police Officers Association and has been with the Stockton Police Department for nearly two decades. Monday, Nance stopped by the FOX40 studio to outline her campaign.
